Description: A high-level classifier indicating the disease status of an individual.
Valid Values: At-Risk RA, OA, RA, SLE, Sjogren's disease, control, cutaneous lupus erythematosus, dermatomyositis, lupus nephritis, psoriasis, psoriatic arthritis, scleroderma, unknown, vitiligo

Description: Unit of measure of value provided for `height`.
Unique identifier assigned to each study participant. For multi-specimen data files provide all IDs in a comma-separated list.
Name of the funding program that supported the generation of data and associated files
Valid Values: AMP AIM, AMP RA/SLE, Community Contribution

Description: The genus species of sample or subject origin.
Age at which subject was enrolled in study or age at corresponding visit and data collection event.
Weight of subject.
Abbreviated unit of measure of value provided for `weight`.
A sub-level attribute of `program` specifying a research initiative working to investigate particular hypotheses.
Valid Values: AIM for RA, ELLIPSS, LOCKIT, RA, SLE, STAMP, V-CoRT

Description: The unit of measure used for `ageEnrollment` and `ageDiagnosis`
A textual description of a person's sex at birth.
A textual description of a person's race.
Valid Values: American Indian or Alaska Native, Asian, Black or African American, Hispanic, Mixed Race, Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander, White, other, unknown

Description: A high-level attribute for grouping attributes into templates.
The ethnicity of a person.
Valid Values: Hispanic or Latino, Not Hispanic or Latino, unknown

Description: Any diseases or medical condition that is simultaneously present in addition to `diagnosis`.
Valid Values: Hashimoto's Thyroiditis, autoimmune thyroid disease, cardiovascular disease, diabetes, inflammatory bowel disease, multiple sclerosis, other, psoriasis, psoriatic arthritis, pulmonary disease, rheumatoid arthritis, systemic lupus erythematosus

Description: Standing height of subject.
Cutaneous Dermatomyositis Disease Area and Severity Index, is a measurement used to characterize cutaneous dermatomyositis severity.
Psoriasis Area and Severity Index, is a measurement of the discoloration, thickness, scaling, and coverage of psoriasis plaques.
A high-level classification of vitiligo based on the distribution and patterning of lesions across the body.
Total body Vitiligo Area Severity Index, a measure of the percentage of vitiligo involvement across the body calculated in terms of hand units.
Vitiligo Extent Tensity Index measures the extent of vitiligo by a numerical score and combines analysis of extensity and severity of vitiligo to produce a constant and reproducible number.
Vitiligo Disease Activity Score, a six-point scale that evaluates the activity of vitiligo
Ordinal ID distinguishing different patient visits.
Type of diabetes mellitus.
